dimension:
8 7/8 x 10 9/16 in. (22.54 x 26.83 cm) (pouch only)
45 in. (114.3 cm) (object part, strap length)
medium: Cotton, ribbons, synthetic fibers, buttons, beads, mirror, plastic, metal studs
title: Bag (m'hype)
description: black pouch decorated on back with cross designs in bright colors and stripes in blue, red and yellow; long strap--black with fuschia and yellow stripes on one side and red fabric with rows of white buttons on opposite side; strap decorated with fuschia, orange, green and yellow pompons on gold beaded tassels and mirror with red edge; front corners of bag have long ribbon tassels--green, pink, red, yellow; buttons at top edge of bag with design band of yellow woven plastic below; silver studs with long synthetic cords in yellow, red and green, and beaded strands with pompons below plastic woven band
